force:lightning:lwc:test:create.description: creates a Lightning web component test file with boilerplate code inside a __tests__ directory.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

filepath.name: filepath
filepath.description: path to Lightning web component .js file to create a test for

force:lightning:lwc:test:create.longDescription: Creates a __tests__ directory in the specified directory. Creates a yourComponentName.test.js file with boilerplate code in the __tests__ directory.

filepath.description: path to Lightning web component .js file to create a test for
filepath.longDescription: Path to Lightning web component .js file to create a test for.

force:lightning:lwc:test:run.description: invokes Lightning Web Components Jest unit tests.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

force:lightning:lwc:test:run.longDescription: Invokes Lightning Web Components Jest unit tests.

debug.longDescription: Runs tests in a Node process that an external debugger can connect to. The run pauses until the debugger is connected. For more information, see: https://jestjs.io/docs/en/troubleshooting

watch.longDescription: Runs tests when a watched file changes. Watched files include the component under test and any files it references.

force:lightning:lwc:test:setup.description: install Jest unit testing tools for Lightning Web Components.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

force:lightning:lwc:test:setup.longDescription: Installs Jest unit testing tools for Lightning Web Components. For more information, see the Lightning Web Components Dev Guide: https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/component-library/documentation/lwc/lwc.testing
